Vaajntxwv mob plaab yuav laug tau ob lub xyoos, nwg tug mob pheej fuam luj heev zuj zug moog txug nub kws vaajntxwv tuag. Nwg cov pejxeem tsi rauv tawg ua kevcai fwm nwg, ib yaam le luas ua rua nwg cov yawmkoob lawm.

Thaus Yehaulaas ua Vaajntxwv nwg noobnyoog muaj peb caug ob xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau yim xyoo. Thaus Yehaulaas tuag tsi muaj leejtwg quaj hab hlub tshua nwg le, luas muab nwg log rua huv Daviv lub nroog tabsis tsi yog ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas.

Cov tuabneeg Alav ibtxha tuaj muab Vaajntxwv Yehaulaas cov tub hlub tua tuag taag, tsuas tshuav Ahaxiyas kws yog tug tub ntxawg xwb. Yog le ntawd, cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees txhaj muab Ahaxiyas tsaa ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg txiv chaw.

Thaus Ahaxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum ob xyoos.  hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau ib xyoos. Ahaxiyas los coj lawv le Vaajntxwv Ahaj tsev tuabneeg tug yaam ntxwv, rua qhov nwg nam Athaliyas yog vaajntxwv Ahaj tug ntxhais hab yog Vaajntxwv Aumelis kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees tug xeebntxwv. Nwg nam yog tug cob nwg ua txhum.
Tom qaab kws Ahaxiyas txiv tuag lawm, nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV, rua qhov nwg muab Vaajntxwv Ahaj tsev tuabneeg ua nwg cov tuavxaam xwb, puab txhaj coj nwg moog ua txhum.

Nwg ua lawv le puab tej lug qha, nwg txhaj koom teg nrug Vaajntxwv Yaulaas kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees ua rog rua tug Vaajntxwv Haxayees kws kaav tebchaws Xilias ntawm Lamaus huv cheebtsaam Nkile-as, txhaj ua rua Vaajntxwv Yaulaas raug mob,
hab nwg lug khu mob huv lub nroog Yexelees, ces Vaajntxwv Ahaxiyas txhaj tuaj saib nwg.

Thaus Ahaxiyas moog saib Yaulaas, Vaajtswv siv lub sijhawm ntawd txuv Ahaxiyas. Thaus Ahaxiyas moog txug, nwg hab Yaulaas txawm moog tawmtsaam Yehus kws yog Nimesis tug tub kws tug TSWV tau xaiv moog tua Ahaj tsev tuabneeg.

Thaus Yehus moog muab Vaajntxwv Ahaj tsev tuabneeg tua tuag taag lawv le tug TSWV rau txim rua Ahaj tsev tuabneeg lawm, nwg rov lug ntsib cov Yudas cov thawjcoj hab Ahaxiyas cov xeebntxwv kws nrug Ahaxiyas tuaj saib Yaulaas ntawd. Yehus txawm muab puab tua tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Yehus tso tuabneeg moog nrhav Ahaxiyas, puab moog nteg tau Ahaxiyas huv lub nroog Xamalis, puab coj nwg lug rua Yehus, hab Yehus muab nwg tua. Luas coj nwg moog log, rua qhov nwg yawm yog Vaajntxwv Yehausafas, tug kws fwm Vaajtswv kawg sab kawg ntsws tug tub xeebntxwv. Ahaxiyas tsev tuabneeg tsi tshuav ib tug ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws le lawm.
Thaus Athaliyas nov has tas, nwg tug tub kws yog Vaajntxwv Ahaxiyas raug tua tuag lawm. Nwg txawm saamfwm kuas luas muab Vaajntxwv Ahaxiyas tsev tuabneeg tua kuas tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Tabsis Ahaxiyas tug muam hu ua Yehausenpas kws yuav tug povthawj Yehauyadas, coj Ahaxiyas cov tub kws yuav raug luas tua ib tug kws hu ua Yau-as moog zais hab tu huv lub Tuamtsev ib chaav. Qhov kws nwg muab Yau-as zais le ntawd, cawm tau Yau-as dlim ntawm Athaliyas txhais teg.
Lub sijhawm kws Athaliyas kaav tebchaws ntawd, Yau-as nkaum huv lub Tuamtsev tau rau xyoo.

Xyoo xyaa tug povthawj Yehauyadas pum has tas, txug sijhawm kws nwg yuavtsum nqeg teg ua num lawv le nwg npaaj sab lawm. Yehauyadas txhaj has rua tsib tug thawj tubrog kws yog: Yehaulaas tug tub Axaliyas, Yehauhanaas tug tub Yisamayees, Aunpes tug tub Axaliyas, Adayas tug tub Ma-axeyas, hab Xikhalis tug tub Elisafas.
Puab txawm moog thoob plawg txhua lub nroog huv tebchaws Yudas, coj cov Levis hab cov thawjcoj ntawm txhua cuab tuaj rua huv Yeluxalees.

Puab suavdlawg tuaj sis sau rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab coglug nrug Yau-as kws yog Vaajntxwv tug tub. Yehauyadas has rua puab tas, “Nuav yog Vaajntxwv tug tub, nwg yuav ua vaajntxwv lawv le tug TSWV tau coglug rua Daviv lawm has tas, Daviv cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua vaajntxwv moog le.
Peb yuav tau ua le nuav: Thaus cov povthawj hab cov Levis tuaj ua num rua Nub Xanpataus, puab cov ntawd ib feem peb ua cov zuv lub Tuamtsev tej roojvaag,
ib feem peb zuv vaajntxwv lub loog hab ib feem peb zuv lub Roojvaag Xules. Taagnrho cov pejxeem tuaj sis sau rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau lub Tuamtsev.

Tsi pub leejtwg moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, tsuas yog cov povthawj hab cov Levis txhaj moog tau xwb. Puab moog tau, rua qhov puab dlawbhuv lawm, tabsis cov pejxeem yuavtsum noog tug TSWV lug hab nyob saab nrau xwb.
Cov Levis tuav rawv ntaaj zuv puagncig vaajntxwv, puab nrug nraim vaajntxwv txhua qhov kws nwg moog. Yog leejtwg moog huv lub Tuamtsev tug ntawd yuav raug tua povtseg.”

Cov Levis hab cov Yudas ua lawv le Yehauyadas has. Cov kws ua num Nub Xanpataus taag los puab tsi tau moog tsev le. Yog le ntawd, cov thawj tubrog txhaj tau puab cov ntawd hab cov kws tuaj hloov puab nub ntawd ua num ua ke.
Yehauyadas muab Vaajntxwv Daviv cov muv, cov thaiv nav ntaaj, tsi has cov luj hab cov miv kws muab khaws ca rua huv lub Tuamtsev coj lug rua tug thawj tubrog.
Ces tug thawj tubrog txawm kuas cov tubrog tuav rawv ntaaj moog sawv thoob plawg ntawm hauv ntej lub Tuamtsev zuv vaajntxwv.

Ces Yehauyadas txawm coj Yau-as tawm lug, muab lub mom kub rua nwg ntoo hab muab Vaajtswv phoo ntawv kevcai cob rua Yau-as; puab muab roj laub rua Yau-as taubhau tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv. Puab suavdlawg npuaj teg hab qw has tas, “Thov kuas vaajntxwv muaj sa nyob ntev!”
Puj Vaajntxwv Athaliyas nov cov tubrog hab cov pejxeem qw, ces nwg txawm dlha ceev nrooj tuaj rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev kws suavdlawg tuaj sis sau.

Puj Vaajntxwv pum tug vaajntxwv kws puab tsaa, sawv ntawm lub Tuamtsev tug ncej qhovrooj lawv le kevcai tsaa vaajntxwv. Cov numtswv, cov tshuab raaj tshuab xyu hab cov pejxeem sawv puagncig vaajntxwv, puab qw hab tshuab raaj tshuab xyu zoo sab kawg le. Athaliyas nyuaj sab heev, nwg dlua rhe nwg cev khaub dluag hab qw has tas, “Ntxeev sab! Ntxeev sab!”

Yehauyadas tsi xaav kuas luas tua Athaliyas rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev, nwg txhaj hu cov thawj tubrog lug hab has rua puab tas, “Coj Athaliyas tawm lawv kis nruab nraab ntawm ob paab tubrog nuav moog. Yog leejtwg lug paab nwg, ces mej ca le muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.”
Cov tubrog txawm nteg Athaliyas hab coj nwg moog rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Neeg kws yuav moog rua huv lub loog, hab puab muab nwg tua rua ntawd.
Tug povthawj Yehauyadas kuas Vaajntxwv Yau-as hab cov pejxeem suavdlawg nrug nwg coglug has tas, puab yuav ua tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg moog le.

Ces cov tuabneeg txawm moog rua tom lub tsev teev Npa-aas hab muab lub tsev rhuav puamtsuaj taag; puab muab tej thaaj hab tej mlom tsoo tawg taag, hab muab tug povthawj Matas kws teev Npa-aas tua rua ntawm cov thaaj hauv ntej.

Yehauyadas tsaa cov povthawj hab cov Levis ua cov saib num huv lub Tuamtsev. Puab ua tej num kws Vaajntxwv Daviv muab cob rua puab, hab puab tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV lawv le txuj kevcai kws Mauxes sau tseg. Dlua le ntawd, puab yog cov ntaus suab nkauj hab hu nkauj.
Hab Yehauyadas tseem tso tubrog zuv lub Tuamtsev tej roojvaag hab tsi pub tug kws tsi huv moog rua huv le.

Cov thawj tubrog, cov numtswv, cov tswvxeev hab cov pejxeem nrug Yehauyadas coj vaajntxwv tawm huv lub Tuamtsev lug rua huv lub loog. Puab coj vaajntxwv moog ntawm lub Roojvaag Theem Sab lug rua huv lub loog hab nwg moog nyob sau lub zwmtxwv.
Cov pejxeem suavdlawg zoo sab kawg nkaus, ces lub nroog nyob ntsag tu, rua qhov puab tub muab Athaliyas tua tuag lawm.
Thaus Yau-as ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj xyaa xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau plaub caug xyoo. Nwg nam hu ua Xinpiyas kws nyob huv lub nroog Npesenpas.
Yau-as ua lawv le tug TSWV sab nyam moog taag tug povthawj Yehauyadas tam.
Yehauyadas yuav tau ob tug quaspuj rua Vaajntxwv Yau-as. Obtug yug tau tub hab ntxhais coob leej rua Yau-as.
Thaus Yau-as ua vaajntxwv tau tsi ntev, nwg txawm txhim khu lub Tuamtsev.

Yau-as has kuas cov povthawj hab cov Levis moog thoob plawg txhua lub nroog huv tebchaws Yudas, hab sau cov pejxeem tej nyaj lug khu lub Tuamtsev lawv le naj xyoo khu. Yau-as kuas puab ca le nqeg teg ua, tabsis cov Levis tseem pheej ncua tseg tsi ua,

yog le ntawd, vaajntxwv txhaj hu Yehauyadas kws yog puab tug thawjcoj lug cuag nwg hab has tas, “Yog vim le caag mej tseem tsi kuas cov Levis ca le moog sau se ntawm cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, lawv le tug TSWV tug tubkhai Mauxes tau has kuas cov pejxeem yuavtsum them se  tuaj khu tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev?”
(Athaliyas kws yog tug tuabneeg ua phem ua qas  cov tuabneeg tuaj muab lub Tuamtsev rhuav pob puag taag. Hab coj tej khoom tseemceeb huv moog siv rua Npa-aas lawm.)
Vaajntxwv has kuas cov Levis txua ib lub thawv, hab kuas muab tso rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev rua suavdlawg coj nyaj tuaj tso rua.

Puab tshaajtawm rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab thoob plawg tebchaws Yudas, kuas txhua tug coj se tuaj rua tug TSWV lawv le Vaajtswv tug tubkhai Mauxes tau has kuas suavdlawg ua thaus puab nyob nraag taj suabpuam.
Cov numtswv hab cov pejxeem txaus sab coj puab tej nyaj tuaj tso puv nkaus huv lub thawv ntawd.

Txhua nub, cov Levis coj thawv nyaj ntawd moog rua vaajntxwv cov numtswv kws saib cov nyaj ntawd. Thaus puab pum has tas nyaj puv thawv lawm, vaajntxwv tug teev ntawv hab tug Povthawj Hlub tuaj muab cov nyaj ntawd rhu tawm hab muab lub thawv moog tso rua ntawm qhov qub chaw. Puab ua le nuav txhaj tau nyaj ntau heev.

Vaajntxwv hab Yehauyadas coj cov nyaj ntawd moog rua cov kws saib cov khu lub Tuamtsev, ces puab coj moog ndlav cov kws txawj txaug pobzeb, txawj kaw ntoo hab txawj nchuav tooj nchuav hlau tuaj khu lub Tuamtsev.
Txhua tug puavleej siv zug ua num hab puab khu tau lub Tuamtsev khov hab zoo ib yaam le lub qub.

Thaus puab khu tav lawm, puab coj tej nyaj tej kub kws seem siv tsi taag lug cob rua vaajntxwv hab Yehauyadas. Obtug muab tej nyaj tej kub ntawd coj moog nchuav ua taig hab tej cuabyeej siv rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Thaus kws Yehauyadas ua neej nyob, suavdlawg tseem tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV ntawm lub Tuamtsev tsi tu le.
Yehauyadas noobnyoog muaj ib puas peb caug xyoo ces nwg txawm tuag lawm.
Vim Yehauyadas muaj txaj ntsig rua cov Yixalayees, rua Vaajtswv teg num hab lub Tuamtsev, luas txhaj coj Yehauyadas moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas huv Daviv lub nroog.
Tabsis tom qaab kws Yehauyadas tuag lawm, cov Yudas tej numtswv txawm tuaj thov kuas Vaajntxwv Yau-as ua lawv le puab has.

Yog le ntawd, cov Yudas txawm tso tseg tsi tuaj pehawm tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev lawm, tabsis puab moog pe tej mlom hab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas. Puab ua txhum le ntawd, ua rua tug TSWV chim heev rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Tug TSWV tso nwg cov cevlug moog coj puab rov lug cuag nwg, tabsis puab tsi noog Vaajtswv cov cevlug has le.

Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig lug kaav hlo Xakhaliyas kws yog tug povthawj Yehauyadas tug tub. Xakhaliyas txhaj moog sawv taabmeeg cov pejxeem hab has rua puab tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv nug has tas, ‘Vim le caag mej tsi noog nwg tej lug saamfwm?’ Mej yuav tsi vaammeej, rua qhov mej tso tug TSWV tseg lawm, nwg txhaj tso mej tseg hab!”
Vaajntxwv Yau-as nrug cov pejxeem ntxeev sab tawmtsaam Xakhaliyas. Vaajntxwv has kuas cov pejxeem muab pobzeb ntaus Xakhaliyas tuag rua huv lub tshaav puam ntawm hauv ntej lub Tuamtsev.

Vaajntxwv tsi ncu txug Xakhaliyas txiv tej txaj ntsig zoo kws nwg tau ua lawm, nwg txhaj muab Xakhaliyas tua tuag lawm. Thaus Xakhaliyas yuav tuag, nwg has tas, “Thov kuas tug TSWV pum tej kws koj ua nuav hab rau txim rua koj.”

Xyoo ntawd thaus lub caij nplooj ntoos zeeg, cov tubrog Xilias txawm tuaj tua lub tebchaws Yudas hab lub nroog Yeluxalees. Puab muab cov thawjcoj tua tuag taag hab fuab tau tej khoom ntau heev coj moog rua peg lub nroog Damaxes lawm.

Txawm yog cov tubrog Xilias tsi coob los tug TSWV ca puab tua yeej cov tubrog Yudas kws coob heev, rua qhov cov Yudas tso tug TSWV kws yog puab cov Yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv tseg lawm. Qhov nuav yog Vaajtswv rau txim rua Yau-as.

Yau-as raug mob saab kawg le, thaus cov yeebncuab thim rov qaab lawm, nwg ob tug thawj tubrog txawm ntxeev sab hab muab nwg tua rua sau txaaj, pauj qhov kws nwg tua tug povthawj Yehauyadas tug tub.  Luas coj nwg moog log rua huv Daviv lub nroog, tabsis tsi yog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas.
(Obtug kws ntxeev sab rua Yau-as, yog Xanpas kws nwg nam hu ua Sime-as kws yog tuabneeg Amoos, hab yog Yehauxanpas, nwg nam hu ua Simelis kws yog tuabneeg Mau-am.)

Nwg cov tub, hab tej lug qha tshwm kws has txug nwg, qhov kws nwg txhim khu tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv  Phoo Ntawv kws teev cov vaajnxtwv lub neej  lawm. Hab nwg tug tub Amaxiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Amaxiyas ua vaajntxwv nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau neeg nkaum cuaj xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Yehauyadees kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Nwg ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV sab nyam, tabsis nwg tsi ua kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws.
Thaus nwg kaav lub tebchaws nyob ruaj lawm, nwg txawm muab ob tug nom kws tua nwg txiv tua povtseg huv tuabsi.

Txawm le ntawd los nwg tsi tua obtug cov mivnyuas, nwg ua le ntawd txhaj lawv le tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm rua huv phoo ntawv kevcai kws Mauxes sau tseg has tas. “Tsi xob muab nam txiv tua vim mivnyuas tej kev txhum, hab tsi xob muab mivnyuas tua vim nam txiv tej kev txhum; tug twg ua txhum, tsuas tua tug ntawd xwb.”

Vaajntxwv Amaxiyas sau taagnrho xeem Yudas hab xeem Npeenyamees cov txivneej ua tubrog lawv le tej cuab. Hab nwg tseem tsaa ib cov thawj saib ib txheeb leej, hab ib cov saib ib puas leej. Nwg sau cov kws muaj noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau, taagnrho yog muaj peb puas txheeb leej. Puab puavleej kawm kev ua rog, txawj nkaug muv, hab txawj siv dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj.
Amaxiyas muab plaub taas nyaj ndlav tau ib puas txheeb leej tubrog Yixalayees tuaj paab puab.
Tabsis muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug tuaj has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Koj tsi xob coj cov tubrog Yixalayees nuav nrug koj moog, rua qhov tug TSWV tsi nrug cov Yixalayees kws yog cov Efalayees.
Koj xaav has tas, puab yuav tuaj paab kuas koj tug zug luj  hab ntaus yeej rog, tabsis Vaajtswv yog tug kws ua kuas yeej lossis swb, nwg yuav ca yeebncuab tua yeej koj.”

Amaxiyas nug tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd has tas, “Tabsis yuav ua le caag rua cov nyaj kws tub muab rua cov tubrog Yixalayees lawm?” Tug cev Vaajtswv lug teb has tas, “Tug TSWV yuav muab ntau tshaaj tej ntawd rua koj.”
Yog le ntawd, Amaxiyas txhaj tso cov tubrog Yixalayees kws nwg ndlav tuaj rov moog tsev. Puab chim heev rua cov Yudas hab rov moog tsev lawm.
Amaxiyas ua sab tawv qhawv coj cov tubrog moog txug huv lub Haav Ntsev. Puab tua cov tubrog Edoos tuag kaum txheeb leej.
hab nteg tau kaum txheeb leej. Puab coj cov kws puab nteg tau ntawd moog rua sau lub hauv tsua ntawm lub nroog Xelas, hab muab pov rua huv qaab tsuas tsoo pobzeb ua rua puab tuag taag.

Thaus ntawd cov tubrog Yixalayees kws Amaxiyas tsi pub nrug nwg moog ntaus rog, txawm moog tua cov Yudas tej nroog kws nyob ntawm lub nroog Xamalis hab Npethes Hauloos ntu nruab nraab. Puab tua cov Yudas tuag peb txheeb leej hab fuab tau khoom ntau heev coj moog lawm.
Thaus kws Amaxiyas moog tua yeej cov Edoos, nwg coj cov Edoos tej mlom lug teev, hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua tej mlom ntawd.

Qhov kws nwg ua le nuav ua rua tug TSWV chim heev. Tug TSWV txhaj tso ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug moog has rua Amaxiyas has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv kws tub paab tsi tau puab cov tuabneeg dlim ntawm koj txhais teg?”

Thaus tug cev Vaajtswv lug tseem taabtom has, Vaajntxwv Amaxiyas txawm teb ndlais has tas, “Leejtwg tau tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv tug tuavxaam? Koj ca le tsum tsi xob has lug lossis yuav ca kuv muab koj tua povtseg?” Ua ntej kws tug cev Vaajtswv lug tso tseg nwg txawm has tas, “Kuv paub has tas, Vaajtswv tub txav txim sab yuav ua kuas koj puamtsuaj, rua qhov koj tau ua tej nuav hab tsi noog kuv lug.”

Vaajntxwv Amaxiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas hab nwg cov tuavxaam ntxeev sab rua cov Yixalayees. Nwg txhaj tso xuv moog rua Vaajntxwv Yehau-as kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees kws yog Yehau-ahas tug tub hab yog Yehus tug xeebntxwv, kuas tuaj nrug nwg sis tua.

Tabsis Vaajtxwv Yehau-as tso tuabneeg moog has rua Amaxiyas has tas, “Muaj ib zag ib tsob ntoo xuavpaug kws nyob peg Roob Lenpanoos tso xuv tuaj rua tsob ntoo cab has tas, ‘Muab koj tug ntxhais rua kuv tug tub yuav ua quaspuj!’ Tabsis txawm muaj ib tug tsaj qus lug muab tsob ntoo xuavpaug ntawd tsuj kag rua huv aav lawm.

Amaxiyas, nwgnuav koj khaav qhov kws koj tua yeej cov Edoos ua rua koj nto npe, koj ca le txaus sab hab nyob tuabywv huv tsev, vim le caag koj yuav nrhav teebmeem rua koj hab koj cov pejxeem kuas puamtsuaj?”
Tabsis Amaxiyas tsi noog Yehau-as tej lug, vim Vaajtswv pum zoo ca Amaxiyas ua tug swb, rua qhov nwg pe cov Edoos tej mlom.
Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Yehau-as kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees txhaj tuaj tua Vaajntxwv Amaxiyas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas. Puab tuaj sis ntsib ntawm lub nroog Npethes Semes huv tebchaws Yudas.
Cov tubrog Yudas txhaj swb hab tsiv taag rov moog tsev lawm.

Yehau-as nteg tau Amaxiyas hab coj moog rua huv Yeluxalees. Yehau-as tsoo tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog txij ndlua ntawm lub Roojvaag Efalayees moog ti nkaus rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Ceg kaum, ntev le ib puas dlaaj.

Yehau-as coj tej nyaj, tej kub, tej cuabyeej huv lub Tuamtsev hab txhua yaam muaj nqes huv lub nroog kws nwg tshawb tau nrug cov tuabneeg kws nwg nteg tau moog rua peg lub nroog Xamalis lawm. Yehau-as tseem coj cov tuabneeg kws raug nteg nrug nwg moog hab.
Tom qaab kws Vaajntxwv Yehau-as kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees tuag lawm, Amaxiyas tseem ua neej nyob tau kaum tsib xyoos ntxiv.

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Amaxiyas ua thaus chiv moog txug thaus xaus hab nwg kev tswjfwm, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv  Phoo Ntawv Keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.

Txij thaus Amaxiyas tso tug TSWV tseg, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees txhaj pheej ntxeev sab rua nwg. Thaus kawg nwg tsiv moog rua huv lub nroog Lakhis, tabsis nwg cov yeebncuab caum qaab moog muab nwg tua tuag rua huv lub nroog ntawd.
Luas txhaj muab neeg thauj nwg rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas huv Daviv lub nroog.
Cov Yudas txawm muab Amaxiyas tug tub Uxiyas kws noobnyoog muaj kaum rau xyoo tsaa ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg txiv chaw.
(Tom qaab kws Amaxiyas tuag lawm, Uxiyas rov moog txeeb tau lub nroog Elas hab muab txhim khu dlua tshab).
Thaus Uxiyas ua vaajntxwv, nwg noobnyoog muaj kaum rau xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau plaub caug ob xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Yekauliyas kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Uxiyas coj lawv le nwg txiv tug yaam ntxwv, nwg ua hum tug TSWV sab nyam.
Nwg ua lub neej fwm Vaajtswv lawv le Xakhaliyas qha nwg, Vaajtswv txhaj foom koob moov rua nwg lub neej vaammeej moog taag Xakhaliyas tam.

Uxiyas moog tua cov Filitees. Nwg tsoo lub nroog Nkas, lub nroog Yanes, hab lub nroog Asedaus tej ntsaa yeej pob puag taag hab nwg xov ntsaa yeej thaiv tej nroog kws nyob ze lub nroog Asedaus, hab tej nroog huv tebchaws Filitees.
Vaajtswv paab nwg tua yeej cov Filitees, cov Alav kws nyob huv Nkunpa-aas, hab cov Munis.
Cov Amoos them nyaj hab kub ntau heev rua Vaajntxwv Uxiyas, nwg muaj fwjchim heev, hab nwg lub koob meej nrov nchaa moog txug tebchaws Iziv.
Uxiyas ua tej chaw tsomfaaj rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Ceg kaum, rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Haav, hab rua ntawm tug ntsaa yeej kws nkhaus hlo huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Hab nwg tseem ua ntau lub chaw tsomfaaj rua tom tej ntug nroog hab khawb ntau lub qhov rau dlej, rua qhov nwg muaj tsaj txhu coob heev nyob rua zaaj taw roob hab huv tej taj nraag saab nubpoob. Uxiyas nyam ua laj ua teb heev, nwg txhaj kuas cov pejxeem cog txiv maab txiv ntoo ntau heev rua sau tej laaj roob hab huv tej teb kws aav zoo.

Uxiyas muaj cov tubrog kws kawm tav kev tua rog coob heev. Vaajntxwv tug thawj tubrog Hananiyees hab ob tug teev ntawv kws yog Ye-iyees hab Ma-axeyas sau cov tubrog ntawd tej npe huv tuabsi ca rua huv ntawv.
Taagnrho cov thawj tubrog muaj ob txheeb rau pua leej.
Puab muaj peb puas xyaa txheeb tsib puas leej tubrog kws txawj tua rog heev, paab vaajntxwv tua nwg cov yeebncuab.
Uxiyas muab tej cuabyeej ua rog, tsi has tej thaiv nav ntaaj, ntaaj, muv, lub mom hlau looj taubhau, tsho hlau, neevnti hab xub, hab qai zeb ntaus zeg hlua rua cov tubrog.

Nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, Uxiyas kuas luas ua tau ib cov cuabyeej tua xub vug hab ib cov tua pobzeb, tso rua sau tej chaw tsomfaaj, hab ntawm tej ceg kaum ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog. Uxiyas lub koob meej nrov nchaa moo lug moog rua txhua qhov hab muaj fwjchim heev, rua qhov Vaajtswv yog tug paab nwg.

Thaus Uxiyas muaj fwjchim lawm, nwg txawm khaavtheeb heev, txhaj ua rua nwg raug puamtsuaj. Nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv; nwg moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau lub thaaj.
Tug povthawj Axaliyas hab yim caum leej povthawj kws muaj zug hab sab tawv heev txawm lawv vaajntxwv qaab moog rua huv.

Puab cheem vaajntxwv has tas, “Uxiyas, koj tsi muaj cai hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab fij rua tug TSWV; tsuas yog cov povthawj kws yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv kws tub ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv lawm txhaj ua tau xwb. Koj ca le tawm huv qhov chaw dlawbhuv nuav moog. Koj tau ua txhum tawmtsaam tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv, mas koj yuav tsi tau txais koob moov ntawm Vaajtswv lawm.”

Uxiyas tseem taabtom sawv ntawm lub thaaj fij ib saab huv lub Tuamtsev, hab tuav rawv lub taig rau moov tshuaj tsw qaab. Uxiyas chim heev rua cov povthawj, ces taamsim ntawd nwg lub hauvplaj txawm mob ruas tawg pleb nreeg.

Ces Axaliyas kws yog tug povthawj hlub hab cov povthawj saib ntsoov Uxiyas lub hauvplaj, ua rua puab ntshai kawg le. Puab txhaj ntab Uxiyas kuas ca le tawm huv lub Tuamtsev moog, Uxiyas txawm tawm ceev nrooj moog, rua qhov tug TSWV tub rau txim rua nwg lawm.

Vaajntxwv Uxiyas mob ruas moog txug nub kws nwg tuag, vim nwg mob ruas, nwg txhaj nyob nwg ib lub tsev. Nwg moog tsi tau rua huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev le lawm. Nwg tug tub Yauthaas txhaj ua tug saib lub loog hab tswjfwm lub tebchaws.
Txhua yaam kws Vaajntxwv Uxiyas ua hab nwg tej kev tswjfwm, Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws yog Amauxes tug tub muab teev tseg ca lawm.

Uxiyas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log ze rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas, tabsis vim nwg mob ruas, luas tsi muab nwg log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas, hab nwg tug tub Yauthaas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Yauthaas ua vaajntxwv nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum rau xyoo. Nwg nam hu ua Yelusas kws yog Xadaus tug ntxhais.

Yauthaas ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV sab nyam ib yaam le nwg txiv ua, tabsis nwg tsi ua txhum le nwg txiv kws yog moog hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab  huv lub Tuamtsev. Txawm le ntawd los cov pejxeem tseem pheej moog ua kev txhum.
Yauthaas yog tug ua lub Roojvaag Qaumteb ntawm lub Tuamtsev hab nwg ua ntau yaam rua sau tug ntsaa yeej Aufeles.
Yauthaas ua ntau lub nroog rua sau tej roob huv tebchaws Yudas, hab nwg ua ntau lub chaw faajxwm hab chaw tsomfaaj rua huv tej haav zoov.

Yauthaas tua yeej cov Amoos tug vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tubrog. Yauthaas kuas cov Amoos ib xyoos twg them plaub taas nyaj, tsib caug txheeb kawm moov qeb, hab tsib caug txheeb kawm moov nplej moog txug peb xyoos.
Yauthaas muaj fwjchim, rua qhov nwg muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv.
Txhua yaam kws Yauthaas ua, nwg kev tswjfwm tebchaws, kev ua rog, hab lwm yaam puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  Ntawv kws teev cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Thaus Yauthaas ua vaajntxwv nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum rau xyoo.
nwg tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua huv Daviv lub nroog, hab nwg tug tub Ahas ua Vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Ahas ua vaajntxwv nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum rau xyoo. Ahas tsi ua lub neej zoo lawv le nwg yawmkoob kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv, tabsis nwg ua tej kws tsi hum tug TSWV sab nyam,
hab nwg ua lawv le cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees ua. Nwg muab tooj nchuav tau ib tug mlom Npa-aas,

nwg moog hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua huv lub Haav Hinoos, hab muab nwg cov tub tua hlawv fij rua tej mlom lawv le cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog ua ntej kws cov Yixalayees lug nyob.
Ahas tua tsaj hlawv fij hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua ntawm tej chaw teev dlaab kws nyob sau tej pov roob hab huv qaab tej tsob ntoo kws muaj nplooj ntxoov nyog.

Vim Ahas tau ua txhum, tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv txhaj ca cov Xilias tug vaajntxwv tuaj tua yeej nwg hab nteg cov Yudas coob heev coj moog rua peg lub nroog Damaxes lawm. Tug TSWV tseem ca cov Yixalayees tug Vaajntxwv Pekas kws yog Lemaliyas tug tub tuaj tua yeej Ahas. Hab nub ntawd cov tubrog Yudas kws yog cov muaj sab tawv raug tua tuag ib puas neeg nkaum txheeb leej. Tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv ca kuas muaj tej xwm nuav lug raug cov Yudas, rua qhov puab tau tso nwg tseg lawm.
Ib tug tubrog Yixalayees hu ua Xikhalis yog tug tua Vaajntxwv Ahas tug tub Ma-axeyas. Axelikas kws yog tug nom saib lub loog hab Ekanas kws yog tug thawj tubrog ntawm Vaajntxwv.
Txawm yog cov Yudas yog cov Yixalayees kwvtij los cov Yixalayees tseem nteg cov Yudas ob puas txheeb leej quaspuj hab mivnyuas, hab fuab khoom ntau yaam coj moog rua peg lub nroog Xamalis lawm.

Audes kws yog tug TSWV tug cevlug kws nyob huv lub nroog Xamalis. Nwg tuaj ntsib cov tubrog Yixalayees kws coj cov Yudas kws puab nteg thaus puab lug txug ntawm ntug nroog. Nwg has rua puab tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog mej cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv chim heev rua cov Yudas, nwg txhaj ca mej moog tua yeej cov Yudas, tabsis qhov kws mej ua limham hab tua puab tuag, Vaajtswv tub nov lawm.
Qhov kws mej coj cov Yudas tej quaspuj hab txivneej nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees lug ua mej qhev. Mej puas paub has tas yog mej ua txhum rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv?
Mej ca le noog kuv has! Cov kws mej nteg lug nuav yog mej cov kwvtij hab cov muam, mej yuav tso puab moog lossis ca tug TSWV chim hab rau txim rua mej?”

Cov Efalayees plaub tug thawjcoj kws yog, Yehauhanaas tug tub Axaliyas, Mesilemaus tug tub Npelekiyas, Salumes tug tub Yehikiyas hab Helais tug tub Amaxas los tsi pum zoo qhov kws cov tubrog ua le ntawd.

Puab has tas, “Mej tsi xob coj cov tuabneeg kws mej nteg ko lug rua huv lub nroog nuav! Peb tub ua txhum rua tug TSWV ua rua nwg chim heev, hab tsimnyog nwg rau txim rua peb lawm. Nwgnuav mej tseem yuav tsub kev txhum ntxiv rua peb hab los?”
Yog le ntawd, cov tubrog txhaj muab cov Yudas kws puab nteg lug, muab tej khoom kws puab fuab tau lug cob rua cov numtswv hab cov pejxeem.

Ces puab txawm tsaa plaub leeg ntawd ua cov saib hab faib tej rig tsho kws puab fuab tau lug, rua cov tuabneeg kws puab nteg lug. Muab tej rig tsho rua puab naav, muab tej khau khab rua puab rau, muab mov rua puab noj, hab muab dlej rua puab haus, hab muab roj txiv ntoo pleev puab tej qhov txhaab. Muab cov kws moog tsi taug kev caij neeg luav, hab coj taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws puab nteg lug ntawd rov moog rua nraag cov Yudas cheebtsaam aav ntawm Yelikaus kws yog lub nroog toovlaaj. Ces cov Yixalayees txhaj rov lug rua peg lub nroog Xamalis lawm.
Cov Edoos rov tuaj tua cov Yudas hab nteg tau coob leej coj moog lawm. Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Ahas txhaj moog thov Tilas Pelexes kws kaav tebchaws Axilias tuaj paab nwg.

Tuab lub sijhawm ntawd cov Filitees txawm tuaj tua cov nroog kws nyob saab nubpoob ntawm tej taw roob hab huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb. Puab txeeb tau lub nroog Npethes Semes, lub nroog Aiyaloos, lub nroog Kedelaus, hab lub nroog Xaukaus, lub nroog Teenas, hab lub nroog Nkixaus, nrug tej zog kws nyob ibncig hab puab ca le nyob huv tej nroog ntawd le lawm.
Vim Vaajntxwv Ahas kws kaav tebchaws Yudas ua tsi ncaaj rua nwg cov pejxeem hab ua txhum rua tug TSWV. Tug TSWV txhaj tso kev txomnyem lug rua cov Yudas.
Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias tsi tuaj paab Ahas tabsis nwg tuaj tua Ahas hab ua rua Ahas raug kev kub ntxhuv ntau yaam.

Yog le ntawd, Ahas txhaj muab taagnrho tej kub huv lub Tuamtsev, huv lub loog hab sau taagnrho cov numtswv tej kub huv puab tej tsev moog rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias, txawm le ntawd los qhov kws nwg ua ntawd paab tsi tau nwg le.
Thaus kws Ahas raug teebmeem, nwg hajyam ua txhum rua tug TSWV heev dlua yaav taag lug.

Nwg tua tsaj fij rua cov Axilias tej vaajtswv kws ua rua nwg swb. Nwg has tas, “Cov Axilias tej vaajtswv ntawd tub paab cov Axilias cov vaajntxwv lawm, yog kuv tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tej vaajtswv ntawd, tej vaajtswv ntawd yuav paab kuv hab.” Qhov kws Ahas ua le nuav, ua rua nwg hab nwg lub tebchaws raug kev puamtsuaj xwb.
Ahas tseem muab tej khoom kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev sau lug hab muab tsoo tawg taag. Nwg muab tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev kaw hab teeb tej thaaj fij rua txhua qhov huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Nwg ua tej chaw teev dlaab rua txhua lub nroog huv tebchaws Yudas hab hlawv tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab fij rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv. Qhov kws nwg ua le nuav ua rua tug TSWV kws yog nwg cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv chim heev rua nwg.

Txhua yaam kws Ahas ua hab nwg kev tswjfwm tebchaws, thaus pib moog txug thaus xaus, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  Ntawv Keebkwm kws teev cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Vaajntxwv Ahas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, tabsis tsi yog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas, hab nwg tug tub Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.

Thaus Hexekiyas ua Vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau neeg nkaum cuaj xyoos. Nwg nam hu ua Anpiyas, hab yog Xakhaliyas tug ntxhais.
Hexekiyas ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV sab nyam ib yaam le nwg yawmkoob kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv ua.
Thawj xyoo kws Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv, thaus lub ib hlis ntuj nwg moog qheb lub Tuamtsev tej roojvaag hab txhim khu dlua tshab.
Nwg hu cov povthawj hab cov Levis tuaj sis sau huv lub tshaav puam ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab nubtuaj,

hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej cov Levis, ca le moog ua kevcai ntxuav kuas mej huv hab ua kevcai ntxuav tug TSWV kws yog mej cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev kuas dlawbhuv. Mej ca le muab txhua yaam kws ua rua lub Tuamtsev tsi dlawbhuv tshem moog povtseg huv tuabsi.
Peb cov yawmkoob tsi muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv hab puab ua phem ua qas taabmeeg nwg. Puab tso nwg tseg hab tig nrausqaum rua nwg.
Puab muab lub Tuamtsev tej qhovrooj kaw, ca tej teeb tuag taag hab puab tsi hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab fij rua cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev lawm.

Tub yog vim le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj chim heev rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Hab tej kws nwg ua rua puab, txhaj ua rua txhua tug ceeb hab ntshai kawg le. Mej yeej paub tej nuav zoo.
Cov kws yog peb txiv raug tua tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog hab peb tej quaspuj mivnyuas raug luas nteg coj moog taag.
“Nwgnuav kuv txav txim sab has tas, kuv yuav coglug rua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, kuas nwg txhaj tsi chim rua peb lawm.
Kuv cov mivnyuas, mej tsi xob ca lub sijhawm dlhau moog. Mej yog cov kws tug TSWV xaiv lug ua cov hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua nwg hab coj suavdlawg pehawm nwg.”

Cov Levis ntawd yog cov kws muaj npe le nraag nuav: Cuab Kauhas yog Amaxais tug tub Mahas hab Axaliyas tug tub Yau-ees. Cuab Melalis yog Adis tug tub Kises hab Yehalees tug tub Axaliyas. Cuab Nkesoos yog Ximemas tug tub Yau-as, hab Yau-as tug tub Edees, cuab Elisafas yog, Simelis hab Ye-ules. Cuab Axafes yog, Xakhaliyas hab Mataniyas. Cuab Hemaas yog, Yehu-ees hab Sime-is. Cuab Yeduthoos yog Semayas hab Uxiyees.
Cov Levis nuav hu puab cov kwvtij tuaj ua ke ua kevcai ntxuav kuas puab huv. Ces vaajntxwv kuas puab ua kevcai ntxuav lub Tuamtsev kuas dlawbhuv lawv le tug TSWV  txuj kevcai.

Cov povthawj moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab ua kevcai ntxuav kuas lub Tuamtsev dlawbhuv. Hab muab txhua yaam kws ua rua lub Tuamtsev tsi dlawbhuv tshem tawm lug tso huv lub tshaav puam ntawm lub Tuamtsev, hab cov Levis maam le nqaa moog povtseg rua huv lub Haav Kiloos kws nyob saab nrau ntug nroog.

Puab pib ua kevcai ntxuav rua thaus lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab ib moog txug nub xab yig. Hab puab khu lub Tuamtsev tej qhovrooj tau yim nub ntxiv, lub ib hlis nub kaum rau puab ua txhua yaam tav txhaj tau lub Tuamtsev ua qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV.

Cov Levis moog tshaab xu rua vaajntxwv has tas: “Peb tub ua kevcai ntxuav lub Tuamtsev kuas dlawbhuv tav taag lawm, tsi has lub thaaj kws hlawv tej khoom fij los yog lub rooj kws rau cov ncuav dlawbhuv, hab txhua yaam cuabyeej siv.

Ntu kws Vaajntxwv Ahas tsi muab sab npuab tug TSWV, nwg rhu txhua yaam huv lub Tuamtsev moog lawm, nwgnuav puab rov muab tej ntawd fij rua tug TSWV, Hab muab tso rua ntawm hauv ntej tug TSWV lub thaaj fij.”
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas sawv ntxuv moog hu taagnrho cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog tuaj sis sau hab puab ua ke moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev.

Puab coj xyaa tug txiv nyuj, xyaa tug laug yaaj, xyaa tug thaav yaaj hab xyaa tug tshis moog tua fij dlaws vaajntxwv tsev tuabneeg hab cov Yudas tej kev txhum hab ua kevcai ntxuav lub Tuamtsev kuas dlawbhuv. Vaajntxwv has kuas cov povthawj kws yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv muab cov tsaj ntawd tua hlawv rua sau lub thaaj fij rua tug TSWV.
Cov povthawj tua cov txiv nyuj ua ntej, maam le tua cov laug yaaj, cov thaav yaaj hab muab cov ntshaav nchus rua lub thaaj.
Tom qaab ntawd puab maam coj cov tshis kws tua dlaws txim lug rua vaajntxwv hab cov pejxeem tsaa teg rua sau cov tshis.
Ces cov povthawj muab cov tshis tua hab muab cov ntshaav laub rua sau lub thaaj fij dlaws cov pejxeem lub txim, rua qhov vaajntxwv saamfwm kuas tua tsaj hlawv fij dlaws cov Yixalayees tej kev txhum.

Vaajntxwv ua lawv le kws tug TSWV has rua Nkas kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv tug cev Vaajtswv lug, hab Nathaas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug. Vaajntxwv kuas cov Levis nqaa nkauj nogncaas hab nruag npuaj tuaj sawv ntawm lub Tuamtsev.
Cov ntawd zoo ib yaam le tej kws thaus u Vaajntxwv Daviv siv, hab cov povthawj tuav rawv puab tej raaj sawv ntawd hab.
Hexekiyas kuas muab cov khoom fij hlawv, thaus pib hlawv cov khoom ces cov pejxeem txawm hu nkauj qhuas tug TSWV, hab cov qoj suab nkauj txawm qoj nkauj nogncaas hab tshuab raaj tshuab xyu.
Txhua tug kws tuaj pehawm tug TSWV nub ntawd puavleej zoo sab, puab hu nkauj hab tshuab raaj tshuab xyu moog txug thaus hlawv tej khoom fij ntawd taag.
Ces Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab cov pejxeem suavdlawg txawm txhus caug ndlua pehawm Vaajtswv.

Vaajntxwv hab cov thawjcoj kuas cov Levis hu tej nkauj kws Daviv hab Axafes kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug sau qhuas Vaajtswv. Yog le ntawd, puab txhua tug txhaj hu nkauj zoo sab hab txhus caug pehawm tug TSWV.

Hexekiyas has rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg tas, “Nwgnuav mej suavdlawg yog tuabneeg huv lawm, mej ca le coj tej tsaj moog tua fij ua tug TSWV tsaug.” Puab suavdlawg noog vaajntxwv lug, hab muaj ibtxha tseem txaus sab hlo coj puab tej tsaj moog tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.
Puab coj xyaa caum tug txiv nyuj, ib puas tug laug yaaj, ob puas tug thaav yaaj moog tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV;
Puab tseem coj rau pua tug txiv nyuj hab peb txheeb tug yaaj moog tua fij hab faib rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg noj.

Vim cov povthawj tsi coob, puab txhaj kuas cov Levis lug paab puab tua cov tsaj moog txug thaus tej num ntawd tav hab cov povthawj ua kevcai ntxuav kuas puab huv. (Rua qhov cov Levis tseem muaj sab ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv dlua cov povthawj)

Dlua le tej khoom fij kws ntau heev ntawd, cov povthawj tseem muab tej roj kws luas tawm ntawm tej nqaj kws muab faib rua cov pejxeem noj, muab cawv txiv maab moog hlawv fij hab. Yog le ntawd, txhaj rov pib muaj kev pehawm Vaajtswv nyob huv lub Tuamtsev dlua.
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab cov pejxeem suavdlawg zoo sab kawg, rua qhov Vaajtswv tau paab puab ua tej num ntawd kuas tav sai heev.

Cov tuabneeg tuaj ua tsi tau Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua thaus lub ib hlis ntuj lawv le lub sijhawm kws teem tseg, rua qhov cov povthawj kws tub ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv tseem muaj tsawg hab tuabneeg tseem tsi tau tuaj txhij rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas, cov numtswv hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees txhaj pum zoo ca ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua thaus lub ob hlis ntuj. Vaajntxwv txhaj xaa xuv moog thoob plawg cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas hab vaajntxwv xaa ntawv moog caw xeem Efalayees hab xeem Manaxes, kuas tuaj rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau qhuas tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv.
Vaajntxwv hab cov pejxeem suavdlawg txaus sab rua qhov kws puab npaaj ntawd,

yog le ntawd, puab txhaj caw taagnrho cov Yixalayees, txij ndlua peg lub nroog Daas moog txug nraag lub nroog Npesenpas kuas tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau lawv le txuj kevcai. Zag nuav tuabneeg tuaj coob tshaaj txhua zag.

Cov tuabneeg xaa xuv txawm moog thoob plawg cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas lawv le vaajntxwv hab cov numtswv kuas puab moog caw suavdlawg has tas, “Cov pejxeem Yixalayees, mej tub tsiv dlim ntawm cov Axilias lawm, yog le ntawd, mej ca le lug cuag tug TSWV kws yog Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, nwg txhaj yuav lug cuag mej.
Mej tsi xob ua ib yaam le kws mej cov yawmkoob hab mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees kws tsi muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv. Mej tub pum ntsoov nwg rau txim rua puab nyaav kawg le.

Mej tsi xob ua tuabneeg tawv ncauj le puab, tabsis mej yuavtsum noog tug TSWV lug. Mej ca le tuaj rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, qhov chaw kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab ua qhov chaw dlawbhuv, hab pehawm nwg moog ibtxhis, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj yuav tsi chim rua mej lawm.

Yog mej rov lug cuag tug TSWV, cov tuabneeg kws nteg mej tej kwvtij moog lawm, yuav hlub puab hab tso puab rov lug tsev. Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, nwg yog tug sab dlawb sab zoo hab muaj kev hlub tshua. Yog mej lug cuag nwg, nwg yuav leeg yuav mej.”

Cov tuabneeg xaa xuv moog thoob plawg txhua lub nroog huv xeem Manaxes, hab huv xeem Efalayees cheebtsaam aav, hab moog txug peg xeem Xenpuloos kws nyob saab qaumteb, tabsis puab luag cov tuabneeg xaa xuv plig hab muab puab tso dlaaj tso luag.
Txawm le ntawd los tseem muaj qee leej kws nyob rua huv xeem Aseles, Manaxes hab Xenpuloos kws txaus sab yuav tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Vaajtswv tseem nyob nrug cov Yudas kuas puab ua tau ib lub sab noog nwg lug hab ua lawv le vaajntxwv hab nwg cov numtswv tej lug saamfwm.
Thaus lub ob hlis ntuj tuabneeg tuaj coob heev rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab ua Kevcai noj Ncuav tsi xyaw Keeb.
Puab muab tej thaaj kws hlawv khoom fij hab hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees coj moog pov rua huv lub Haav Kiloos.

Lub ob hlis ntuj nub kaum plaub, puab tua cov thaav yaaj fij ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau. Cov povthawj hab cov Levis kws tsi tau ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv, puab txaajmuag kawg le, puab txhaj ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv hab tua tsaj hlawv fij rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
Puab rov moog ua puab teg num huv lub Tuamtsev, lawv le Mauxes kws yog Vaajtswv tug tuabneeg txuj Kevcai. Cov Levis muab cov taig ntshaav rua cov povthawj coj moog nchus rua lub thaaj.
Rua qhov tseem tshuav tuabneeg coob tsi tau ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv, cov Levis txhaj tua cov thaav yaaj fij ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua cov kws tsi tau ua kevcai ntxuav ntawd.

Dlua le ntawd, xeem Efalayees, xeem Manaxes, xeem Ixakhas, hab xeem Xenpuloos tseem muaj cov kws tsi tau ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv coob heev, yog le ntawd, qhov kws puab tuaj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau, puab ua tsi lawv le txuj kevcai. Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas txhaj thov Vaajtswv paab rua puab has tas,
“Tug TSWV kws yog peb cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv, koj yog tug muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo, thov koj zaam txim rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv nuav.”
Tug TSWV teb Hexekiyas tej lug thov hab zaam txim rua puab.
Suavdlawg tuaj ua Kevcai noj Ncuav tsi xyaw Keeb huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tau xyaa nub, puab zoo sab kawg le, cov povthawj hab cov Levis naj nub qhuas tug TSWV kawg puab tug dlaag tug zug.

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas qhuas cov Levis qhov kws puab txawj coj suavdlawg pehawm tug TSWV tau zoo heev. Puab noj tej zaub mov kws ua kevcai hab tua tsaj fij rua tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv hab ua nwg tsaug tau xyaa nub,
ces puab pum zoo rov ua rooj noj rooj haus xyaa nub ntxiv. Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj ua rooj noj rooj haus lomzem hab zoo sab heev.

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas muab ib txheeb tug txiv nyuj, xyaa txheeb tug yaaj, hab cov numtswv muab ib txheeb tug txiv nyuj hab kaum txeeb tug yaaj rua cov pejxeem tua noj. Cov povthawj kws ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv muaj coob heev.

Yog le ntawd, puab txhua tug zoo sab heev, tsi has cov Yudas, cov povthawj, cov Levis hab cov pejxeem Yixalayees kws tuaj peg qaumteb tuaj, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees hab tebchaws Yudas.
Suavdlawg muaj kev lomzem zoo sab thoob plawg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, rua qhov txij thaus Vaajntxwv Xalumoos kws yog Daviv tug tub lug tsi tau muaj dlua rooj noj rooj haus luj le nuav.
Cov povthawj hab cov Levis thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg. Vaajtswv nyob sau ntuj kws yog nwg qhov chaw dlawbhuv nov puab tej lug thov hab foom koob moov rua puab.

Tom qaab kws puab ua rooj noj rooj haus dlhau lawm, cov Yixalayees moog thoob plawg txhua lub nroog huv tebchaws Yudas hab tsoo tej ncej zeb, ntuv tug mlom quaspuj Aselas, rhuav tej thaaj fij hab tej chaw teev dlaab. Puab ua le ntawd moog thoob plawg huv tebchaws Yudas hab thoob plawg huv xeem Npeenyamees, xeem Efalayees, hab xeem Manaxes cheebtsaam aav huv tuabsi, ces puab maam rov lug tsev.

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas faib num rua cov povthawj hab cov Levis kuas nyag ua nyag lub luag num kws muab cob rua puab lawm. Puab teg num yog hlawv khoom fij, fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo, ua Vaajtswv teg num huv lub Tuamtsev, qhuas hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug huv lub Tuamtsev.
Tej tsaj kws hlawv fij thaus sawv ntxuv hab thaus tsaus ntuj, cov kws tua fij Nub Xanpataus, Nub Hli Xab hab lwm yaam kevcai lawv le tug TSWV txuj kevcai has tseg puavleej yog vaajntxwv muab.

Dlua le ntawd, vaajntxwv has kuas cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees coj tej khoom fij kws yog cov povthawj hab cov Levis tug, tuaj rua puab, puab txhaj muaj sijhawm ua num lawv le tug TSWV txuj kevcai qha tseg.

Thaus cov Yixalayees nov vaajntxwv tej lug saamfwm lawm, puab coj tej qoobloo kws zoo heev, tsi has nplej, txiv maab, roj txiv ntoo, zib ntaab hab lwm yaam kws puab cog hab sau tau lug ntawm puab tej qoobloo thawj phaum hab puab coj ib feem kaum  ntawm txhua yaam kws puab muaj tuaj.
Taagnrho tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv txhua lub nroog huv tebchaws Yudas coj puab tej nyuj, tej yaaj kws yog ib feem kaum hab puab tseem coj ntau yaam tuaj fij rua tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.
Thaus lub peb hlis, puab pib coj tej khoom pub ntawd tuaj teeb moog txug lub xyaa hli maam taag.
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab nwg cov numtswv pum suavdlawg coj khoom tuaj ntau heev lawm, puab txawm ua tug TSWV tsaug, hab foom koob moov rua cov pejxeem.
Vaajntxwv qha tej khoom pub nuav rua cov povthawj hab cov Levis,

hab tug Povthawj Hlub Axaliyas kws yog Xadaus tug xeebntxwv has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Txij thaus cov pejxeem pib nqaa puab tej khoom pub tuaj rua huv lub Tuamtsev, peb muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag. Peb tau txais txhua yaam nuav tub yog tug TSWV tau foom koob moov rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”
Vaajntxwv has kuas puab ua ib cov chaav rau khoom rua huv lub Tuamtsev,

puab muab tej khoom pub hab cov ib feem kaum ntawd coj moog ca rua huv cov chaav ntawd. Puab tsaa ib tug Levis hu ua Kaunaniyas ua tug saib tej khoom ntawd hab tsaa nwg tug kwv Sime-is ua tug paab nwg.

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab tug Povthawj Hlub Axaliyas tsaa cov Levis kaum leej kws yog: Yehiyees, Axaxiyas, Nahas, Axahees, Yelimaus, Yauxanpas, Eliyees, Imakiyas, Mahas hab Npenayas ua cov paab Kaunaniyas hab Sime-is.

Imenas kws yog xeem Levis tug tub Kaules, nwg yog tug thawj kws saib lub Roojvaag Nubtuaj ntawm lub Tuamtsev, ua tug kws txais tej khoom pub kws suavdlawg coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV hab muab tej khoom ntawd faib.
Edees, Minimees, Yesuas, Semayas, Amaliyas hab Sekaniyas kws yog cov povthawj nyob rua tej lub nroog, faib tej zaub mov rua cov Levis sis npaug zog lawv le puab teg num,

tabsis tsi yog faib lawv le tej cuab kwvtij. Puab faib rua cov txivneej txhua tug kws noobnyoog peb caug xyoo  lossis laug dlua ntawd kws naj nub tuaj ua num huv lub Tuamtsev lawv le puab teg num xwb.
Luas faib num rua cov povthawj lawv le tej cuab hab luas faib num rua cov Levis kws noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau lawv le puab tej paab.
Puab coj puab tej quaspuj mivnyuas moog sau npe, rua qhov puab yog cov kws muaj lub sab ncaaj nceeg hab tswj puab kuas ua tau tuabneeg dlawbhuv.

Cov povthawj kws yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv kws nyob huv tej nroog lossis tom puab tej teb hab huv tej zog kws nyob ibncig tej nroog. Puab yog cov kws faib zaub mov rua cov txivneej kws yog cov povthawj tsev tuabneeg hab txhua tug kws sau npe zwm rua cov Levis txhua cuab.
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas ua nwg teg num ncaaj nceeg thoob plawg tebchaws Yudas hab ua hum tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv sab.

Txhua yaam kws vaajntxwv ua, tsi has ua lub Tuamtsev, lossis ua lawv le tug TSWV tej kevcai, nwg muab sab rau nrhav Vaajtswv, hab muab sab npuab Vaajtswv kawg sab kawg ntsws, nwg teg num txhaj vaammeej.

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas muaj lub sab ncaaj nceeg ua Vaajtswv teg num txhua yaam tav. Tom qaab ntawd Xenakhelis kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Axilias txawm tuaj tua tebchaws Yudas. Nwg tub xub tuaj vij cov nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej khov kho thaiv, hab kuas nwg cov tubrog tsoo tej ntsaa yeej moog rua huv lub nroog.
Thaus Hexekiyas pum has tas, Xenakhelis yuav tuaj tua lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Nwg hab nwg cov numtswv txav txim sab txhub tej qhovdlej saab nrau ntug nroog kuas thaus cov Axilias tuaj txug ntawm lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuas puab tsi tau dlej haus. Cov numtswv txhaj coj ib paab tubrog coob heev le moog meem tej qhovdlej tsi pub kuas dlej ndlwg tshwm qhov twg le.

Vaajntxwv khu tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog tej ntu kws pob lawm, hab ua tej chaw tsomfaaj rua sau tug ntsaa yeej  hab ua ib txheej ntsaa yeej rua saab nrau. Dlua le ntawd nwg khu tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv Daviv lub nroog, hab nwg ua tau ib cov muv hab ib cov thaiv nav ntaaj ntau heev.
Vaajntxwv tsaa ib cov thawj tubrog ua cov saib tej pejxeem hab kuas puab tuaj sis sau rua ntawm lub roojvaag lub chaw laas tshaav. Vaajntxwv has rua puab tas,
“Mej ca le ua sab tawv qhawv hab tsi xob ntshai tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias hab nwg cov tubrog. Tug kws tuaj peb tog muaj zug dlua tug kws tuaj nwg tog.
Nwg tug zug tsuas yog zug tuabneeg xwb, tabsis peb muaj tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv paab peb tua rog.” Vaajntxwv tej lug txhawb cov pejxeem zug heev.
Tom qaab ntawd, thaus Xenakhelis tseem nyob huv lub nroog Lakhis, nwg tso xuv rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab cov Yudas has tas,
“Kuv yog Xenakhelis kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Axilias nug has tas, ‘Dlaabtsi ua rua mej tso sab nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws luas tub vij taag lawm?
Hexekiyas has rua mej tas, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav paab kuas mej dlim ntawm peb lub fwjchim, tabsis yog Hexekiyas dlaag mej, yuav ca mej tshaib plaab hab nqhes dlej tuag xwb.

Nwg yog tug kws rhuav tej chaw pehawm tug TSWV, tej thaaj fij hab tseem has rua cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tas, mej tsuas moog pehawm hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau tuab lub thaaj xwb.
Mej puas tau paub tej kws kuv cov yawmkoob hab kuv tau ua rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg lawm? Cov tuabneeg ntawd tej vaajtswv puas paab tau puab dlim ntawm tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Axilias?
Thaus twg cov tebchaws ntawd tej vaajtswv paab tau puab tsaav tuabneeg dlim ntawm peb? Yog le ntawd, dlaabtsi ua rua mej xaav has tas, mej tug Vaajtswv yuav paab tau mej dlim?

Nwgnuav mej tsi xob ca Hexekiyas dlaag tau mej hab coj mej yuam kev le ntawd. Mej tsi xob ntseeg nwg tej lug! Tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg tug vaajtswv yuav cawm tau nwg tsaav tuabneeg dlim ntawm cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv txhais teg le. Yog le ntawd, mej tug Vaajtswv los yeej cawm tsi tau kuas mej dlim le hab!’ ”
Cov Axilias cov numtswv has lug phem heev rua tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv hab rua Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas kws yog tug TSWV tug tubkhai.

Xenakhelis sau ib tsaab ntawv tuaj thuam tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, “Lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv tub cawm tsi tau puab dlim ntawm kuv txhais teg, txawm yog Hexekiyas tug Vaajtswv los yeej cawm tsi tau nwg tsaav tuabneeg dlim ntawm kuv txhais teg le hab!”
Cov Axilias cov numtswv ua lug Henplais tshev nrov nrov kuas cov tuabneeg Yixalayees kws tuaj nyob sau tug ntsaa yeej ntshai hab poob sab hab kuas puab txhaj txeeb tau lub nroog yoojyim.
Puab has txug lub nroog Yeluxalees tug Vaajtswv ib yaam le puab has txug lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv kws yog tuabneeg txhais teg puab.
Ces Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws yog Amauxes tug tub txawm quaj thov Vaajtswv paab.

Tug TSWV txhaj tso ib tug timtswv tuaj tua cov Axilias cov numtswv hab cov tubrog tuag taag. Yog le ntawd, cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv txhaj rov qaab txaajmuag ntsuav rua peg tebchaws Axilias lawm. Muaj ib nub thaus nwg nyob huv lub tsev kws teev nwg tug vaajtswv, nwg ob tug tub txawm muab ntaaj tua nwg tuag lawm.

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj cawm Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas hab cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees dlim ntawm Xenakhelis kws kaav tebchaws Axilias hab ntawm lwm paab yeebncuab txhais teg. Tug TSWV ca cov Yudas nyob thaajyeeb lug  tsi pub lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj tua puab.
Muaj tuabneeg coob nqaa khoom tuaj fij rua tug TSWV hab pub rua Hexekiyas huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Yog le ntawd, txij ntawd lug txhua tsaav tuabneeg txhaj fwm Hexekiyas heev.
Thaus ntawd Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas mob nyaav hab yuav tuag. Nwg thov hab tug TSWV ua ib qhov cim qha rua nwg paub has tas nwg tug mob yuav zoo.
Tabsis Hexekiyas khaavtheeb heev, nwg tsi ncu tug TSWV tej txaj ntsig kws qha nwg ua zoo, tug TSWV txhaj chim rua nwg, rua cov Yudas hab rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Hexekiyas leeg txim qhov kws nwg khaavtheeb, hab cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees los leeg txim ib yaam nkaus, yog le ntawd tug TSWV txhaj tsi rau txim rua puab moog txug thaus Hexekiyas tuag.

Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas npluanuj, txhua tug txhaj fwm nwg heev. Vaajntxwv ua tau ib chaav tsev rau nwg tej nyaj tej kub, tej qai zeb muaj nqes, tej tshuaj tsw qaab, tej thaiv nav ntaaj hab lwm yaam kws muaj nqes.
Nwg ua tau ntau lub txhaab rau nplej, cawv txiv maab hab roj txiv ntoo, nwg ua ntau lub nkuaj kaw nwg tej nyuj, hab ua ntau lub nkuaj kaw nwg cov yaaj.
Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua Hexekiyas muaj yaaj, muaj nyuj hab muaj lwm yaam ntau heev, nwg txhaj rhawv tau ntau lub nroog.
Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas txhub tug dlej Kihoos hab khawb kwj tso ndlwg moog rua saab nubpoob ntawm Daviv lub nroog. Txhua yaam kws Hexekiyas ua puavleej vaammeej.

Cov tuabneeg Npanpiloos tso ib cov numtswv tuaj nug Hexekiyas txug tej txujci kws tug TSWV ua huv nwg lub tebchaws. Vaajtswv ca Hexekiyas ua lawv le nwg sab nyam, rua qhov Vaajtswv xaav sim Hexekiyas sab.

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Vaajntxwv Hexekiyas ua, hab qhov kws nwg muab sab npuab tug TSWV, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv Amauxes tug tub Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug zaaj ywgtoog hab huv phoo  Ntawv Keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.

Hexekiyas tuag hab luas coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas kws yog theem sab. Taagnrho cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, puavleej tuaj ua kevcai fwm thaus nwg tuag. Hab nwg tug tub Manaxes ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Manaxes ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj kaum ob xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau tsib caug tsib xyoos.
Manaxes ua txhum rua tug TSWV, nwg ua kev phem kev qas ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog ua ntej nwg tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob lawm.

Manaxes rov txhim khu tej chaw teev dlaab kws nwg txiv Hexekiyas muab rhuav taag lawm. Nwg ua ntau lub thaaj fij teev tug mlom Npa-aas hab puab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas ib yaam le Vaajntxwv Ahaj kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees ua. Manaxes tseem pe tej nubqub hab.
Manaxes ua ntau lub thaaj teev dlaab rua huv lub Tuamtsev, muab teeb rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV has tas, tsimnyog ca ua qhov chaw rua suavdlawg pehawm nwg.
Manaxes ua ntau lub thaaj rua ntawm ob lub tshaav puam ntawm lub Tuamtsev ua qhov chaw pe tej nubqub.
Manaxes muab nwg cov tub tua hlawv fij rua huv lub Haav Hinoos. Nwg ua khawvkoob, ua yeegsiv, saib teg hab saib yaig. Manaxes ua txhum luj heev rua tug TSWV, tug TSWV txhaj chim rua nwg.

Nwg muab tug mlom quaspuj Aselas lug teev rua huv lub Tuamtsev, ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV has rua Daviv hab Daviv tug tub Xalumoos has tas, “Lub Tuamtsev huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav yog qhov chaw kws tug TSWV xaiv tawm ntawm kaum ob xeem Yixalayees lug ua qhov chaw rua suavdlawg tuaj pehawm kuv.

Yog cov Yixalayees noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le tej kevcai kws kuv tug tubkhai Mauxes muab rua puab lawm, kuv yuav tsi pub kuas puab raug ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.”
Vaajntxwv Manaxes coj cov Yudas moog ua txhum luj tshaaj tej kev txhum kws lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws tug TSWV muab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog ua ntej nwg tsaav tuabneeg lug nyob ua lawm hab.
Txawm yog tug TSWV ntuag Manaxes hab nwg cov pejxeem los puab tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug le.

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj ca cov tubrog Axilias tuaj tua lub tebchaws Yudas. Puab nteg tau Manaxes, muab khawb hlau chaws nwg qhovntswg hab muab saw hlau khi nwg caab moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Thaus Manaxes raug kev txomnyem le ntawd, nwg txhaj txu fwjchim hab tig rov lug cuag tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv, hab thov tug TSWV paab nwg.

Vaajtswv nov nwg tej lug thov hab teb nwg, tug TSWV tso nwg rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab ca nwg kaav lub tebchaws dlua. Qhov nuav qha rua Manaxes paub has tas, tug TSWV yeej yog Vaajtswv tag.

Dlhau ntawd lug, Manaxes txhim khu tug ntsaa yeej saab nrau kws thaiv Daviv lub nroog ntawm saab nubtuaj kuas sab ntxiv. Pib kag ntawm lub kaum huv lub haav kws ze lub qhovdlej Nkihoos kws nyob saab qaumteb moog rua ntawm lub Roojvaag Ntseg, hab moog rua ntawm lub nroog qhov chaw kws hu ua Aufes. Hab nwg tseem tso ib cov thawjcoj tej paab tubrog moog nyob txhua lub nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv huv tebchaws Yudas.

Nwg muab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tej vaajtswv hab tej mlom kws puab tso rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab tej thaaj teev dlaab kws luas ua rua sau lub pov roob ntawm tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, tshem coj moog povtseg huv tuabsi rua saab nrau ntug nroog.

Nwg rov khu lub thaaj kws pehawm tug TSWV, nwg tua tsaj hlawv fij ua kev sis raug zoo hab ua tug TSWV tsaug rua sau lub thaaj ntawd. Nwg rov saamfwm rua cov Yudas txhua tug kuas pehawm tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv.
Txawm le ntawd los cov tuabneeg tseem pheej moog tua tsaj hlawv fij rua lwm qhov chaw, tabsis yog puab fij rua tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv xwb.

Dlua le lwm yaam kws Manaxes ua, nwg tej lug thov Vaajtswv, hab tej lug kws cov cevlug tuav tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv lub npe has rua nwg, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  Ntawv Keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees cov vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.

Vaajntxwv tej lug thov Vaajtswv, Vaajtswv teb nwg, nwg tej kev txhum hab tej kev phem kev qas kws nwg ua, tej thaaj teev dlaab, tej mlom quaspuj Aselas kws nwg nchuav, hab tej mlom kws nwg pe ua ntej kws nwg leeg txim, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv cov cev Vaajtswv lug phoo ntawv keebkwm lawm.
Manaxes tuag hab luas muab nwg log rua huv nwg lub loog, hab nwg tug tub Amoos ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Amoos ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum ob xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau ob xyoos.
Amoos ua txhum rua tug TSWV ib yaam le nwg txiv Manaxes ua ntaag, hab nwg pe tej mlom kws nwg txiv pe.
Tabsis nwg tsi txu fwjchim hab tsi tig rov lug cuag tug TSWV ib yaam le nwg txiv. Nwg hajyam ua txhum luj tshaaj nwg txiv.
Amoos ib tug numtswv ntxeev sab rua nwg, hab muab nwg tua tuag rua huv lub loog.
Cov Yudas muab cov tuabneeg kws tua Amoos tua povtseg, hab tsaa Amoos tug tub Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg txiv chaw.
Thaus Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj yim xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb caug ib xyoos.
Yauxiyas ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV sab nyam, nwg ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej kevcai, ib yaam le nwg yawmkoob Daviv ua.

Thaus Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv tau yim xyoo, nwg tseem hluas heev, nwg pib pehawm nwg yawmkoob kws yog Vaajntxwv Daviv tug Vaajtswv. Tau plaub xyoos tom qaab nuav nwg txawm muab tej chaw teev dlaab, tej mlom quaspuj Aselas hab lwm yaam rhuav povtseg huv tuabsi.

Nwg has kuas nwg cov tuabneeg muab tej thaaj fij kws teev Npa-aas hab tej thaaj kws hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab kws nyob ze puab tsoo povtseg. Puab muab tej mlom quaspuj Aselas hab lwm yaam mlom zum ua moov coj moog nphoo rua cov tuabneeg kws pe tej mlom ntawd tej ntxaa.

Nwg muab cov povthawj kws teev dlaab tej pobtxhaa coj lug hlawv rua sau tej thaaj kws puab teev dlaab. Nwg ua le ntawd kuas cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees rov ua tau tuabneeg huv.
Nwg ua ib yaam le ntawd rua xeem Manaxes, xeem Efalayees, xeem Xime-oos, hab lwm lub nroog moog txug peg xeem Nathalis cheebtsaam aav.

Nwg moog thoob plawg tebchaws Yixalayees kws nyob saab qaumteb hab tsoo tej thaaj, tej mlom Aselas, muab tej mlom zum ua moov, hab tsoo tej thaaj kws luas hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab tawg taag, nwg maam rov lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Thaus Yauxiyas ua vaajntxwv tau kaum yim xyoo, tom qaab kws nwg ua kevcai ntxuav lub tebchaws hab lub Tuamtsev kuas huv hab tsi muaj kev pe dlaab lawm. Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas txhaj tso Axaliyas tug tub Safas, Ma-axeyas kws yog tug tswv nroog Yeluxalees, hab Yau-ahas tug tub Yau-as kws yog ib tug numtswv moog khu tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev.

Cov Levis kws zuv qhovrooj sau tej nyaj kws luas coj tuaj rua huv lub Tuamtsev, coj moog rua Hilekiyas kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub. (Cov nyaj ntawd yog puab sau ntawm cov Efalayees, cov Manaxes hab cov Yixalayees kws nyob saab qaumteb, cov Yudas, cov Npeenyamees hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.)
Luas muab cov nyaj ntawd rua peb tug kws saib cov tuabneeg khu lub Tuamtsev. Hab puab muab rua cov
kws txua ntoo hab cov ua tsev, coj moog yuav pobzeb hab ntoo lug khu tej tsev kws cov Yudas cov vaajntxwv muab tso tseg puamtsuaj taag lawm.

Cov tuabneeg kws khu lub Tuamtsev ncaaj nceeg heev, plaub tug Levis kws saib cov tuabneeg ua num ntawd yog: Yahaj hab Aunpadiyas kws yog cuab Malalis, Xakhaliyas hab Mesulas kws yog cuab Kauhas. (Cov Levis ntawd puavleej txawj qoj suab nkauj.)
Muaj dlua ib paab Levis ua cov saib tej khoom kws luas coj tuaj, hab saib tej paab tuabneeg kws ua num. Ibtxha ua cov ceev tej ntaub ntawv lossis ua cov zuv roojvaag.
Thaus luas muab cov nyaj ntawd nqaa tawm huv chaav rau nyaj lug taag lawm, Hilekiyas pum tug TSWV phoo ntawv kevcai, yog phoo Kevcai kws Vaajtswv muab rua Mauxes.
Nwg has rua Safas has tas, “Kuv moog pum phoo ntawv kevcai nuav nyob huv lub Tuamtsev.” Nwg txawm muab phoo ntawv rua Safas,
hab Safas coj moog rua vaajntxwv. Nwg has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Peb tub moog ua txhua yaam kws koj has rua peb ua ntawd tav taag lawm.
Peb muab cov nyaj kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev coj moog rua cov tuabneeg kws khu lub Tuamtsev hab cov thawj kws saib puab lawm.”
Safas has tas, “Phoo ntawv nuav Hilekiyas muab rua kuv.” Ces Safas txawm muab nyeem rua vaajntxwv noog.
Thaus vaajntxwv nov tej lug huv phoo ntawv kevcai ntawd, vaajntxwv nyuaj sab heev hab dlua rhe nwg lub tsho,
hab has rua Hilekiyas, Ahikas kws yog Safas tug tub hab Anpedoos  kws yog Mikayas tug tub, has rua Safas kws yog tug teev ntawv hab Axayas kws yog tug kws nrug nraim vaajntxwv has tas,

“Mej ca le paab kuv hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees hab tebchaws Yudas nug tug TSWV txug tej lug huv phoo ntawv nuav saib qha le caag. Tug TSWV chim heev rua peb los tub yog peb cov yawmkoob tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug hab tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav kuas yuavtsum tau ua.”

Hilekiyas, Ahikas, Anpaus, Safas hab Axayas txawm moog cuag ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws yog quaspuj hu ua Hulidas kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees ceg kaum kws luas ua tshab. (Hulidas tug quasyawg hu ua Salumes kws yog Tivas tug tub hab yog Hahas tug xeebntxwv, nwg yog tug saib cov tsho ntev huv lub Tuamtsev.) Puab pav tej ntawd rua Hulidas noog,
nwg kuas puab rov moog cuag vaajntxwv,

hab has rua vaajntxwv has tas, tug TSWV has le nuav: “Kuv rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog, lawv le tej lug kws sau tseg rua huv phoo ntawv kws vaajntxwv nyeem ntawd.

Puab tau tso kuv tseg hab moog tua tsaj hlawv fij rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv, kuv txhaj chim rua tej kws puab ua, hab kuv chim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees. Kuv tej kev chim yuav tsi xaam moog sai.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, kuv has le nuav rua vaajntxwv: Thaus koj nov tej lug huv phoo ntawv nuav taag lawm,

koj leeg koj tej kev txhum hab txu fwjchim taabmeeg kuv, koj quaj tu sab hab dlua rhe koj lub tsho, thaus koj paub has tas, kuv yuav rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov tuabneeg huv tuabsi. Tabsis vim kuv tub nov koj tej lug thov lawm,
kuv yuav tog kuas koj tuag tsaiv, kuv maam le rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees. Kuv yuav ca koj tuag kaaj sab lug.” Puab txawm coj tej lug ntawd moog pav rua Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas noog.
Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas kuas cov Yudas tej thawjcoj hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj cuag nwg,

hab puab ua ke moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, tsi has cov povthawj, cov Levis hab taagnrho cov pejxeem tug muaj tug pluag los moog huv tuabsi. Vaajntxwv nyeem taagnrho phoo ntawv coglug kws nrhav tau huv lub Tuamtsev rua suavdlawg noog.

Vaajntxwv sawv ib saab ntawm tug ncej  kws cov vaajntxwv ibtxwm sawv, coglug rua tug TSWV has tas, yuavtsum fwm nwg, ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws, hab ua kuas tau lawv le tej lug cog tseg kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav.

Vaajntxwv has kuas cov Npeenyamees hab txhua tug kws tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees coglug has tas, puab yuav ua lawv le puab tej lug cog tseg ntawd. Yog le ntawd, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees txhaj ua lawv le tej lug kws puab tau cog rua puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv.

Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas rhuav tej mlom phem qas kws nyob huv cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws hab Yauxiyas kuas suavdlawg yuavtsum pehawm tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv moog taag nwg simneej le.
Lub ib hlis ntuj nub kaum plaub, Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau huv lub nroog Yeluxalees qhuas tug TSWV; puab tua ntau tug tsaj ua rooj noj rooj haus.
Vaajntxwv faib num rua cov povthawj ua huv lub Tuamtsev, hab txhawb puab zug kuas puab ua tau num zoo.

Hab nwg has rua cov Levis kws qha cov Yixalayees kws puab muab puab fij rua tug TSWV lawm has tas, “Mej ca le muab tug TSWV lub Phijxaab coj moog tso huv lub Tuamtsev kws Daviv tug tub kws yog Vaajntxwv Xalumoos ua. Mej yuav tsi tau kwv lub Phijxaab nuav ib qho rua ib qho lawm, tabsis mej tsuas ua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv teg num hab paab nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees xwb.
Mej tej cuab, nyag ca le moog ua nyag teg num huv lub Tuamtsev lawv le Vaajntxwv Daviv hab nwg tug tub kws yog Vaajntxwv Xalumoos tau faib rua mej lawm,
hab npaaj rawv tog paab cov Yixalayees txhua tsev tuabneeg.

Mej yog cov kws tua tej yaaj hab tej tshis ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau. Nwgnuav mej ca le moog ua kevcai ntxuav kuas mej huv, mej txhaj fij tau cov kwvtij Yixalayees tej tsaj lawv le tug TSWV txuj kevcai kws qha rua Mauxes lawm.”
Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas muab nwg cov tsaj peb caug txheeb tug yaaj, thaav yaaj hab tshis, hab peb txheeb tug txiv nyuj rua cov pejxeem tua ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau.

Vaajntxwv cov numtswv los muab ntau yaam paab cov pejxeem, cov povthawj hab cov Levis tau siv. Tug Povthawj Hlub Hilekiyas, Xakhaliyas hab Yehiyees kws yog cov numtswv saib lub Tuamtsev muab ob txheeb rau pua tug thaav yaaj hab mivnyuas tshis hab peb puas tug txiv nyuj rua cov povthawj tua fij rua thaus ua lub rooj noj haus ntawd.

Kaunaniyas, Semayas hab nwg tug kwv Nathanees, Hasanpiyas, Ye-iyees hab Yauxanpas kws yog cov Levis cov thawjcoj muab tsib txheeb tug thaav yaaj hab mivnyuas tshis hab tsib puas tug txiv nyuj rua cov Levis tua hlawv fij.
Thaus npaaj txhua yaam ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau txhij lawm, cov povthawj hab cov Levis txawm moog sawv ntawm puab qhov chaw lawv le vaajntxwv has.
Tom qaab kws muab cov thaav yaaj hab mivnyuas tshis tua lawm, cov Levis muab laws tawv hab cov povthawj muab cov ntshaav nchus rua lub thaaj.
Puab muab cov tsaj kws hlawv fij faib rua tej paab ntawm tej tsev tuabneeg, coj moog hlawv fij rua tug TSWV lawv le Mauxes txuj kevcai qha tseg. Cov nyuj los puab ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.

Cov Levis muab cov thaav yaaj kws tua ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau coj moog ca hab muab cov nqaj kws ua kevcai fij dlawbhuv lug hau rua huv laujkaub, huv qhws, huv yag hab muab tej nqaj ntawd faib rua cov pejxeem.

Tom qaab kws ua le nuav taag lawm, cov Levis maam faib nqaj rua puab hab cov povthawj kws yog Aloos cov xeebntxwv. Rua qhov cov povthawj tseem hlawv tej tsaj kws muab hlawv taagnrho hab hlawv tej roj fij moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.

Cov hu nkauj kws yog Axafes cov xeebntxwv moog sawv ntawm puab qhov chaw lawv le Vaajntxwv Daviv, Axafes, Hemaas hab Yeduthoos kws yog vaajntxwv tug cev Vaajtswv lug has tseg lawm. Cov Levis kws zuv lub Tuamtsev tej roojvaag, tsi taag yuav tso puab teg num tseg moog ua lwm yaam, rua qhov cov Levis tub npaaj Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua puab lawm.
Yog le ntawd, nub ntawd puab ua txhua yaam tav taag, tsi has kev pehawm tug TSWV, Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau hab tua tsaj hlawv fij rua sau lub thaaj lawv le Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas has rua puab.
Cov Yixalayees ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau, hab noj Ncuav tsi xyaw Keeb tau xyaa nub.

Txij thaus tug cev Vaajtswv lug Xamuyees tam lug, tsi tau ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau luj le zag nuav. Cov vaajntxwv kws kaav taag lug lawm, tsi muaj ib tug ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau luj npaum le Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas, cov povthawj, cov Levis, cov Yudas, cov Yixalayees hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees ua zag nuav
kws yog thaus Yauxiyas kaav tebchaws tau kaum yim xyoo lawm.

Tom qaab kws Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas ua tej nuav tav taag rua lub Tuamtsev lawm, Vaajntxwv Nekaus kws kaav tebchaws Iziv coj ib paab tubrog tuaj tua rog rua ntawm Kakhemis kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Efalates. Yauxiyas txawm moog cheem Nekaus,

tabsis Nekaus tso xuv tuaj rua Yauxiyas has tas, “Cov Yudas tug Vaajntxwv, kuv tuaj ua rog zag nuav, tsi txug koj yuav tuaj txuam yuaj. Kuv tuaj nuav tsi yog tuaj tua koj, tabsis tuaj tua kuv cov yeebncuab hab Vaajtswv kuas kuv ca le kawgkag moog. Vaajtswv tuaj kuv tog, koj tsi xob tuaj taabkaum kuv, nyob tsaam Vaajtswv ua rua koj puamtsuaj!”
Tabsis Yauxiyas tsi noog Vaajtswv tej lug kws has rua Vaajntxwv Nekaus, rua qhov nwg yeej npaaj sab tuaj sis tua ntaag. Yog le ntawd, Yauxiyas txawm hloov ua cuav moog sis tua huv lub taj Menkidaus.
Thaus puab taabtom sis tua, cov Iziv txhaj tua xub neevnti tuaj raug Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas. Nwg has rua nwg cov tubrog has tas, “Kuv raug mob saab heev lawm, ca le coj kuv moog.”

Puab tsaws nwg huv nwg lub tsheb neeg lug rua lwm lub tsheb neeg kws nyob ntawd, hab coj nwg lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Yauxiyas tuag rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab luas coj nwg moog log rua ntawm cov vaajntxwv lub toj ntxaas. Thaus Yauxiyas tuag, taagnrho cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees puavleej quaj ntsuag.

Tug cev Vaajtswv lug Yelemis sau tau ib zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag hu rua Vaajntxwv Yauxiyas. Zaaj nkauj ntawd ca le ua ib zaaj nkauj rua cov Yixalayees hu thaus tej txivneej lossis tej quaspuj ib tug twg tuag. Zaaj nkauj nuav muab sau tseg rua huv phoo nkauj quaj ntsuag.
Txhua yaam kws Yauxiyas ua, qhov kws nwg muab sab npuab tug TSWV, ua lawv le txuj kevcai,
hab nwg lub neej thaus pib moog txug thaus xaus puavleej muab sau ca rua huv phoo  Ntawv keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas tej vaajntxwv lub neej lawm.
Cov Yudas xaiv Yauxiyas tug tub Yehau-ahas hab muab nwg tsaa ua vaajntxwv nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus Yehau-ahas ua Vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum peb xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb hlis.
Vaajntxwv Nekaus kws kaav tebchaws Iziv tuaj nteg Vaajntxwv Yehau-ahas coj moog hab yuam kuas cov Yudas them xyaa txheeb tsib puas choj nyaj hab xyaa caum tsib choj kub rua nwg.

Hab Vaajntxwv Nekaus tau tsaa Yehau-ahas tug tijlaug Eliyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws Yudas, hab muab nwg hloov npe hu ua Yehauyakees. Nekaus coj Yehauyakees nrug nwg moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm.

Thaus Yehauyakees ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum tsib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum ib xyoos. Yehauyakees ua txhum rua tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv.
Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos txhaj tuaj tua tebchaws Yudas hab nteg tau Yehauyakees, muab saw hlau khi coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Nenpukajnexales coj tej nyaj tej kub huv lub Tuamtsev ibtxha moog tso rua huv nwg lub loog kws nyob tim tebchaws Npanpiloos.

Txhua yaam kws Yehauyakees ua, tsi has tej kev phem kev qas hab tej kev txhum kws nwg ua, puavleej muab sau ca rua huv  Phoo Ntawv Keebkwm kws teev cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas cov Vaajntxwv  lub neej lawm, hab nwg tug tub Yehauyakhees ua vaajntxwv hloov nwg chaw.
Thaus Yehauyakhees ua Vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj kaum yim xyoo, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau peb hlis hab kaum nub. Nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV.

Thaus lub caij nplooj ntoos hlaav, Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales txawm tuaj nteg Yehauyakhees moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos, coj taagnrho tej nyaj tej kub huv lub Tuamtsev moog lawm. Ces nwg txhaj tsaa Yehauyakhees tug txiv ntxawm  Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yudas hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus Xedekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas, nwg noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum ib xyoos, hab nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kaav tau kaum ib xyoos.
Nwg ua txhum rua tug TSWV, nwg tsi txu fwjchim, hab tsi noog Yelemis kws yog tug TSWV tug cevlug kws cev tej lug tseeb.

Xedekiyas ntxeev sab rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales, tug kws yuam kuas Xedekiyas tuav Vaajtswv lub npe coglug has tas nwg yuav muab sab npuab Nenpukajnexales hab nwg muaj lub sab tawv tsi kaam leeg txim hab tig lug cuag tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv.
Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, cov Yudas tej thawjcoj, cov povthawj hab cov tuabneeg ca le moog nrug tej tuabneeg kws nyob ibncig puab pe puab tej mlom, ua rua tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv tsi huv lawm.
Tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv khaiv cov cev Vaajtswv lug ntuag puab ua ntu zug, rua qhov nwg hlub nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab lub Tuamtsev.

Tabsis puab saib tsi taug Vaajtswv cov cevlug, tsi quavntsej nwg tej lug hab luag cov cev Vaajtswv lug plig moog txug thaus tug TSWV chim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, puab txhaj tsiv tsi dlim tug TSWV txujkev rau txim le.

Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj coj tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tuaj tua puab. Tug vaajntxwv ntawd tua cov Yudas tej tub hluas tuag pawg lug rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Nwg tsi taabncuab leejtwg le, tsi has tug laug tug hluas, quaspuj lossis txivneej, tug muaj mob lossis tug noj qaab nyob zoo. Vaajtswv muab puab txhua tug cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales teg.
Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos muab tej nyaj huv lub Tuamtsev, muab vaajntxwv hab nwg cov numtswv tej nyaj kub, hab txhua yaam coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Nwg tis tawg hlawv lub Tuamtsev hab lub nroog Yeluxalees, vaajntxwv tej loog hab txhua yaam muaj nqes kws nyob huv tej loog kub nyab taag, hab tsoo tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv lub nroog pob puag taag.
Nwg coj cov tuabneeg kws seem moog huv tuabsi rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos. Puab ua nwg hab nwg cov xeebntxwv qhev moog txug thaus lub tebchaws Pawxias muaj vaajntxwv kaav.

Yog le ntawd, txhaj muaj lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws has rua Yelemis kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug has tas, “Lub tebchaws yuav nyob qhuav nkuag xyaa caum xyoo, kuas lub tebchaws muaj xyoo Xanpataus su,  rua qhov puab tsi ca lub tebchaws su le.”

Thawj xyoo kws Xailas ua fuabtais  kaav tebchaws Pawxias, tug TSWV txhaj ua kuas muaj lawv le nwg tau has rua Yelemis tug cev Vaajtswv lug lawm. Tug TSWV tshoov Xailas sab kuas ua lawv le tej lug saamfwm nraag nuav. Hab muab sau xaa moog nyeem nrov nrov rua tsoom pejxeem thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws kws Xailas kaav noog.

“Ntawm nuav yog Xailas kws yog tug fuabtais kaav tebchaws Pawxias tej lug saamfwm. Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv, tug kws nyob sau ntuj tau tso kuv lug kaav taagnrho lub qaab ntuj nuav hab kuas kuv txhim khu lub Tuamtsev rua nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees huv lub xeev Yudas. Nwgnuav mej cov kws yog Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg, mej ca le rov qaab moog rua mej lub tebchaws hab thov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv nrug nraim mej.”
